timeline.message:
:bug: Added conversationExistanceUpdater to handle graph closure 
Added consversationExistanceUpdater that depends on 
newGraphUpdateComponent to handle when a graph is closed.
Made other updateControllers dependent on this and modified them to 
handle the null graph case where required.

:bug: Modified methods to handle null graph case.
Modified to handle the null graph case for when these methods are 
called without an active graph.

timeline.bodyText: You can declare this variable here (rather than a couple lines above) since it doesn't seem to be used outside this code block. Also can make it final
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: Can possibly remove commented out code if it's not needed
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: I know you didn't add this but if you make this final please that would be good
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: this import isn't used according to sonar
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText:
Is there any reason you have used Objects.isNull?
This is a minor feedback but to me Objects.isNull looks a bit out of place given the rest of the code base doesn't use this approach to check for null. Are you able to change this to graph == null so it looks more familiar? There are several occurrences of this method that would require changing in this PR.
Apparently it is useful inside lambda functions, see https://stackoverflow.com/a/46025437.
timeline.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText:
No meaningful reason, just personal preference. I find it easier to read,
Changed.
replies.author: Nova-2119

timeline.message:
:art: Small improvement as requested in PR
Made variable final
Changed Objects.isnull() to == null
Removed commented out code
Restricted variable scope
